title: gt hook doesn't set assignee - breaks hook lookup
description:
Bug: 'gt hook <bead>' sets status to 'hooked' but doesn't set assignee field.

Effect: 'gt hook status' queries for beads where assignee=current_agent AND status=hooked, finds nothing.

Workaround: Manually run 'bd update <bead> --assignee=<agent-path>' after hooking.

Fix needed: gt hook command should set assignee to current agent identity (e.g., tanwa_info/polecats/furiosa).

**Current workaround:** gt-sling-fix and gt-hook-fix scripts manually run bd update --assignee after hooking.

**Check on gt upgrade:** Test if `gt hook` now sets assignee. If so, remove workaround scripts.

title: [GT-UPGRADE] Witness should auto-spawn polecat sessions
description:
Currently the Witness monitors polecats but doesn't spawn Claude sessions when work is hooked.

**Current workaround:** gt-sling-fix script spawns tmux session after hooking.

**Desired behavior:** When Mayor slings work to a polecat, Witness should detect the hooked bead and spawn the Claude session automatically.

**Check on gt upgrade:** Test if `gt sling` now spawns sessions. If so, remove workaround from gt-sling-fix.

title: Check if gt hook/sling workarounds still needed after gt upgrade
description:
After gt is upgraded, verify if these bugs are fixed:

1. gt hook doesn't set assignee field (gm-0fn)
2. gt sling fails to hook beads properly

If fixed, remove:
- ~/gt/bin/gt-sling-fix
- ~/gt/bin/gt-hook-fix  
- Workaround section in ~/gt/CLAUDE.md

Test by running:
  gt sling <bead> <rig>
  gt hook status  # Should show the hooked bead

Current gt version: gt version 0.1.1
